content: this legal case took place in the municipal court of pazin and involves a property dispute the applicant requested the dissolution of coownership and offered compensation to the other parties the properties in question are a house and yard that cannot be divided various documents were presented as evidence including land registry extracts and certificates the court granted the applicant full ownership of the properties and determined specific amounts to be paid to the other coowners the court also decided that opposing parties have a lien on the properties
